title: Numerical Analysis I
description: Introduction to numerical algorithms for some basic problems in computational mathematics. Discussion of both implementation issues and error analysis.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2602 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2603 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T
